item.title: BJP District President Submits Petition for Infrastructure Development in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gawal: In an effort to address various pressing issues in the district, BJP District President S. Ramachandra Reddy met with the District Collector, SE of the Electricity Department, BSNL Divisional Engineer, and SE of the Roads and Buildings Department. He submitted a petition requesting urgent action on these matters.
The BJP delegation emphasized the necessity of resolving critical infrastructure and civic issues in the district, particularly in Aiza town, which is a major hub connecting Gad...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
